Those theories are whack.
The Alien sees through its dome omnidirectionally. Kind of like a 360 degree camera. That opaque dome is like one big eye that sees all over.

Shitty collection. Shitty. Shitty. Shitty.

Superman. MCU should probably have in universe comic books. As a nod to DC, marvel could cast Frasier as the guy who plays Superman in MCU superhero films.
But, didn't he go extemely bald and gain all the weight in the world since The Mummy flicks?

Damn, those watches. I always envied the cool kids with those on their wrists. Parents wouldn't buy me one, so I rocked the Fruity Pebbles watch out of my cereal box.

WRITING.TITLE: Got one too many. PM me. You can have it. Free. Meet you at the door.

WRITING.TEXT:
There is no Chili Mac at Freddie's. Nor is there a bean croc. But they do have hotdogs. Shitty, crusty from a flat grill hotdogs.
Fuck Freddie's.

As a third generation, Seventh Degree Rodeo Master, I am quite ashamed to admit that I am scared of equine farts.
Bulls, goats, and pigs can fart all day. Heck, they could all shit in my face at once and I wouldn't bat an eyelash, but if I hear so much as a toot from a horse or horse-like being, my blood runs cold and fight-or-flight kicks in.
This hasn't been much of a problem until recently. Someone has been feeding the horses, ponies, donkeys, and zebras nothing but Enchiritos from Taco Bell. I haven't had the balls to enter a Rodeo Battle Arena in months. My kids are suffering from scurvy.
Please send donations. Or, if you can't do that, please investigate and discover the person or persons behind the misfeeding of my hoofed pals, and kill him/her/them.
Shalom!
Try to order the Chili Mac at Freddy's sometime... Or maybe a bean croc.
Steak and Shake, yes. Bojangles, too!
Salina area, eh?

I don't understand popular opinion on Blomkamp. I thought that District 9 was pretty OK. Elysium was better, and Chappie was the most enjoyable of the three...
I'm pumped for a Blomkamp Aliens sequel. As long as they can do it before Weaver kicks the bucket.

Marvel had nothing to do with my review, while I do thoroughly enjoy their films and comics (especially while I down a bowl of my favorite Rold Gold pretzels), they paid me nothing to piss all over Snyder's brand of white-ish brown, salted charcoal. Two stars for your comment.

TBH, those are some lousy pretzels. While the sticks themselves are not so awful as to be commented on publicly, the nuggets are fucked. I have an easier time chomping through a bowl of Gobstoppers than those bastards. People talk about Cap'n Crunch shredding the ceilings of their cock holes... Snyder's straight up peels the ceiling right off. From the teeth to the uvula. Bone. That salty taste? Your own blood and tissue. Three stars.
